mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEMB_NO, ID, PASSWORD, NAME, BIRTHDATE, EMAIL, TEL, ADDRESS, NICKNAME, PROFILE_IMAGE_PATH, SIGN_UP_DATE, ADMIN_ID) VALUES (memb_seq.nextval,#{id},#{password},#{name},#{birthdate},#{email},#{tel},#{address},#{nickname},#{profile_image_path},sysdate,'ADMIN')
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME=#{nickname}
